name: TUMP
description:
Wow !! I am impressed that you are reading this.
You have to live a lot of emotions.
Happiness, joy and free emotions FAST EXPLOSION !!

If you still think that you are cool, strong and DO NOT WIN!

Then fly into our game called TUMP.
Here you will play for the jelly monsters who are fighting for freedom and their friends.
You have to go through many worlds from dungeons to lands of other dimensions.
Well do not think that everything is so easy. You will have to take all your will into a fist and do so .......

But how exactly do you know in the game! :)
Also in the game there will be fascinating dialogs that reveal the plot of the game.

And remember the most important choice is yours.
